title: David Hembrow (swimmer)
text: David Hembrow (born 2 June 1947) is a British former <a href="Swimming%20%28sport%29">swimmer</a>. He competed in the <a href="Swimming%20at%20the%201968%20Summer%20Olympics%20%E2%80%93%20Men%27s%204%20%C3%97%20100%20metre%20freestyle%20relay">men's 4 × 100 metre freestyle relay</a> at the <a href="1968%20Summer%20Olympics">1968 Summer Olympics</a>.
